name: Treasure Fever
description:
Adventure through monster filled dungeons as Dwayne the Dwarf on a search for loot to appease his insatiable treasure addiction, caused by a curse placed on him by a dark witch!

Play through 6 cute pixel art levels filled with parkour, traps, and fire imps (just to name a few).

Unlock different battle axes through the in game shop!

Try to discover the secrets, hidden in certain levels...

Check Screenshots for more info, controls and gameplay!

This Game was created for KJam #1 in 72 hours. In this time all music, sound affects, code and assets were made by me.
